game.name: Train Simulator: First Capital Connect Class 377 EMU Add-On
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam Cloud, Steam 순위표, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: The Class 377 ‘Electrostar’ is Britain’s most common Electric Multiple Unit and a favourite of London commuters, and now you can drive this advanced passenger train on Train Simulator.Replacing the popular slam door trains on south coast routes, the Class 377 is a common sight on routes out of Londo
game.shortDescriptionEn: The Class 377 ‘Electrostar’ is Britain’s most common Electric Multiple Unit and a favourite of London commuters, and now you can drive this advanced passenger train on Train Simulator.Replacing the popular slam door trains on south coast routes, the Class 377 is a common sight on routes out of Londo
